long_description: The Giro Signal snow goggles deliver a comfortable fit and good optical performance at a great value, saving you some money without compromising your vision on the slopes. Grey Cobalt lens has a gray tint with 10% visible light transmission (VLT) and a blue mirror finish to provide good color definition and glare reduction on sunny days. Cylindrical lens is made using an injection-molding process that helps minimize lens distortion so you can see clearly. Anti-fog coating and lens vents also help prevent inner lens from fogging up and obstructing your view. Dual-layer face foam features a fleece layer to ensure a comfortable seal around the face. Frame is engineered to offer an optimal, ergonomic fit around facial anatomy, resulting in excellent comfort and helmet compatibility. The Giro Signal snow goggles are designed to fit medium-size adult faces.
